com.googlecode.t7mp

Class AbstractT7TomcatMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.googlecode.t7mp.AbstractT7BaseMojo
        • com.googlecode.t7mp.AbstractT7TomcatMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    T7Configuration, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunForkedMojo, RunMojo, StopForkedMojo

    public abstract class AbstractT7TomcatMojo
extends AbstractT7BaseMojo
implements T7Configuration
    Takes configurations for t7 Tomcat only (no TomEE).
    Author:
    Joerg Bellmann
